website_summaries.verdict: For a disc golf basket that looks and functions just like the ones on the course, this is your best option.
pros: The construction quality and design of this model are comparable to competing baskets, and the PDGA-approved design means you can get an authentic disc golf experience at home

customer_reviews.title: NICE Basket
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research and reading a ton of reviews I finally pulled the trigger. I purchased this basket Sunday and got it today 6/18/19. Instantly put it together and throwing discs within 15 mins. It took longer to find a level spot than putting it together. Also something that I was pleasantly surprised about was the quality of the chains, they are heavy duty, just like on a course quality chains. So all in all this is a great basket for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket!
customer_reviews.text: For a portable basket I have been thoroughly satisfied with this purchase. It catches well, and transports ok. I used a large wreath bag to store it unassembled. When I don't feel like driving to my local course I set this up in the backyard for some field work. Mine seems to have a manufacturing defect where the threaded ends where bent slightly so the basket is slightly tipped. It didn't significantly affect usability so I didn't feel like going to the effort of seeking a replacement. For the money this is a great value and the color selection was a big factor in choosing this over the MVP version which is essentially the same exact product.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Solid Design
customer_reviews.text: I love this Basket. This basket catches beautifully!! The high quality chain structure is what I was looking for. I also love that it's easy and quick to assemble. I was able to assemble it in about a minute. This is the best basket I've ever used. If you're looking for a basket that is very similar to the permanent course basket look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Update: perfect new basket! Rusted chains upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was sent a beautiful replacement basket for my trouble woth thr chaons....so appreciated and it is wonderful. I was really excited about receiving this item. Set up was easy, but my chains were already rusted when I received it. Not very happy with the quality. Basket seems to be sturdy, just lacking quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. I’ve had course quality poke holes before and really the only difference is the base and pole weight. The top and chain assembly on this is great and they provide tent stakes to anchor it since it is a little top heavy. This is way more portable than it’s more expensive counterparts. Great for the money - should last several years. Spray it down with some clear rustoleum if you’re in a rainy/salty area if you’re worried about rust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, especially compared to competitors.
customer_reviews.text: Vastly superior in terms of assembly and construction to other consumer level baskets. I bought a Versus one for about the same price and it is terrible compared to this one. This has 2 rows of chains and construction seems heavy duty enough to last for years. Assembly literally took 3 minutes. Got it on sale during prime day which made it an ultra bargain, but even at regular price it is totally worth it. You’d have to spend 2x this to get better quality. The only low ratings for this relate to shipping experience, nothing to do with the item itself (why do people do this?}.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rutt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, sturdy portable basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket met all my expectations and then some. We have had this for a few months and use it regularly. It has helped me with my putting and upshots big time and has been great for my son as well, playing around in the yard. Assembly is very quick and easy, which makes this great for moving around to different spots like we enjoy doing at local parks. One thing that is a con is that it is fairly heavy because of how awkward the shape is so I will probably be looking into a travel case for carrying it around from spot to spot eventually. I would recommend this to anyone who loves the game of disc golf.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket. It is well made and catches discs just like the professional baskets on the course. I looked at a few other baskets but went with this and I am glad I did. Only modification I made was to wrap the inner pole with pipe insulation so the noise does not bother my neighbors in the evening. I am going to order another soon so I can throw in both directions. Great Basket.
customer_reviews.author: chris frye

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money. It looks awesome , is easy to assemble, and is pretty sturdy. I didn’t have any packaging or shipping issues which is the most common complaint and oh BTW this is a practice basket not something that you find on the course. The disc is less likely to stick than say a DiscCatcher but its dimensions are great for practice... which is exactly what it’s for.
customer_reviews.author: Derick

customer_reviews.title: 60-second setup - works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. You never know what you're going to get until it arrives. You read reviews and hope for the best. Well, luckily this one checked-out A-OK! It's high-quality, plenty of weight and operates as you would expect. Mine's been outside in the elements for several months showing no signs of rust or wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mark's valuable input

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is exactly what I needed to practice on... it catches just as well or better than some course baskets I have played on. It can be moved but not as portable as some of the fabric baskets, but that is fine with me. The bright colors also add to the quality they have put in to making these. Thank You Axiom!! You made an Awesome basket!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is AWESOME! I love it! I was looking for something for putting practice, but it could be used on a course. the chains are heavy and the metal is very thick. The powder coating is beautiful. Very easy to put together and you don't need any tools. I would say to put it together where you plan on using it because its a little heavy. Would be nice if it had a little wheel on it. Would definitely buy it again, but don't think I'm going to need to get another one any time soon. Or I could buy a few more and set up a nine hole, three tee course in my yard haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Peck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality and sturdy. Chains are standard thickness like you'd see at your local course. Powder coating appears to be pretty thick and rugged. Screw joint connections go together smooth, and hold really well. It's pretty heavy, but can easily be moved around the yard. Get it, you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: J-Mo

customer_reviews.title: This basket does the job!
customer_reviews.text: First, the bad. The box the unit was shipped in was torn in several places when the product arrived. Fortunately, nothing was missing. As for the basket itself, it is super! It is very easy to put together. No tools are needed. It is sturdy and stands on it's own. I haven't had to use the supplied stakes yet. This product works just like a basket you would find at a disc golf course. I have no complaints. Be aware that the basket is heavy and difficult to move without taking it apart (thought it's easy to put back together). One suggestion for the company is to include a carrying case to transport the basket components.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Gator

customer_reviews.title: Solid basket
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of a basket, and this doesn't disappoint. Very solid construction, and catches really well. I purchased the orange basket, and it's a little darker than the picture. Somewhere between a hunter's orange and a burnt orange? I'm actually glad with the color in person vs the color pictured. I have a feeling this is going to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome catcher it has been out in the snow all winter. We have gotten about 4 feet since I got it and its doing great and still usable. It can wobble on uneven ground but I plan to make a platform I can mount it to with revelers so I can move it around the property with the pallet forks on my tractor.
customer_reviews.author: crazy man.

customer_reviews.title: Official Pro Disc Golf regulation size.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the paint . The colors are vibrant with a glossy finish. The chains are heavy duty . This comes with a couple stakes to make for a more permanent spot or have it more stable for uneven ground. Official Pro Disc Golf regulation size. L
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: As good as the real course!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to practice on a basket that has the same characteristics, without buying the professional, fixed models, then this is for you. Very easy to assemble and move around the back yard. Great compromise on weight and portability. Gives a very true target and characteristic for backyard practice without breaking the bank. Highly recommend for those who place more value on using course quality basket vs. light and easily portable.
customer_reviews.author: GRL

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable basket!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy double row of chains, catches great, easy to move around, good price, shipping included to HI - what's not to like??
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Orange is Neon, not School Bus
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I expected, and is as advertised with one exception. I bought the “orange”, which appears like a school bus color I’m the images, it’s actually orange. Like neon orange. I’m not complaining, I love it, but be advised pic is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Bucs Fan

customer_reviews.title: Catches well. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job catching discs. Chains are a good weight and the whole basket is easy to move. Light rust has started at welds, it's humid here in the south so it can't be avoided even with it being kept in the garage. Will probably need repainted every few years but functionality is great. Happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: CJGrubby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome basket! Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome basket! Super easy to set up. Sunk a 95 ft field ace and it didn't budge not even staked down! Bottom is kind of tough to unscrew but there is a bolt inside you can loosen with a tool.
customer_reviews.author: Ciavash

customer_reviews.title: Packaging damage
customer_reviews.text: Basket is missing chips of paint because there is no padding in the box. At first, I thought it was used. I'll have to paint it again to prevent rust. Aside from that, the assembly is very easy. It's sturdy enough, except that the base could be a little wider. I would recommend buying this is you want a regulation basket in your backyard.
customer_reviews.author: George Kavulich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, very durable, heavy chains
customer_reviews.text: We love our new disc golf basket! When it arrived the box was in good shape. My kids and I had it un-boxed and assembled within 10 minutes. It sits level and the threads are heavy gauge, which is good for long-term durability. The assembled product is on the heavy side: which is great for long-term use, but can be challenging for younger ones to move without adult help. The yellow color is bright among our green backyard and the chains are heavy - just like on the real courses we play. My family loves this product and will use it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Justin B. McKeand

customer_reviews.title: Legit size and stability
customer_reviews.text: I've been in the market for a decent priced basket for practice for quite a while and finally went with this one. It's far superior to the other baskets I've seen in this price range. The chains are heavy, just like the pro models and would take a lot to tip over. Very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: chains are heavy enough to catch a disc
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. I like how it screws together. Makes it very convenient to disassemble and carry. It catches discs well. Unfortunately, I did not have it very long before some of the welds broke on the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Stan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket! Great Quality! Will Buy Another
customer_reviews.text: This basket is very well made and is sturdy. Looks amazing and plays well. A wonderful addition to my backyard. My friends loving coming over for some competitions. Thanks for this awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Witty B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who has become an avid disc golf fan. Great for the backyard on the days he can’t get to the park. Durable, portable, functional. Husband says as good as the park.
customer_reviews.author: T. Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Box appeared to be beaten to a pulp. Cage was bent because of it
customer_reviews.author: David Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and great putting basket! I found it to be exactly the same as the black hole pro but Axiom gives different color options and is on average cheaper. Also amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: John Omar Lapp

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting pratice at home
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was a bit flimsy, but basket arrived in perfect shape. Assembly was fast and easy. I'll probably put something around the upper pole where the chain loops are to reduce noise for the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: E. Holmquist

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones at the courses
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones at the courses. Looks great and works great. I left it outside for a month and no signs of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Perryman

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for yard
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, no tools, just stack and spin. Paint had a few chips out if the box (not damaged). Pretty good for a practice basket in the yard and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A Alms

customer_reviews.title: Great basket so far
customer_reviews.text: Day one with the basket and it's pretty solid. Just what I was looking for! The sound is just like your on the field. My box arrived just fine and even if was damaged, it's not likely going to mess up this basket inside a box. Possibly through UPS but this arrived through USPS. The video is right after assembly and my first throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Devildog

customer_reviews.title: Good target for practice, bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I play disc golf pretty regularly so practicing putts in the back yard was a fun decision. While I enjoy this product and all parts came in I have to mention the delivery or packaging was absolutely terrible. Everything was matted up, box was torn a sunder, and was completely open. I dont know if that was Amazon delivery, Axiom Discs terrible packaging and care standards, or a little of both. Overall really like the disc catcher, but definitely made me question my purchase as soon as It arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Best basket i've EVER owned
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a well built pro grade portable basket, snag this one up! I got the baby blue Axiom Pro, and it is hands down the best portable basket on the market. I've built multiple courses over 23 years of discin and owned many baskets. Seriously, look no further, the price is right, and the build quality is stellar!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Robison

customer_reviews.title: Heavy chains, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy chains and quality product. I plan to spray with clear coat and keep it under the carport this winter. Nothing like that sound when your disc hits the chains! Pink was cheaper than other colors, and it suits me fine.
customer_reviews.author: SueL.

customer_reviews.title: Course feel / backyard pricing
customer_reviews.text: I picked up one of these for backyard putting practice and it's every bit as good as any of the local course baskets. It's super tough and the chains are nice and heavy. It grabs putts well and even grabs longer 200ft drives with ease. I'll definitely get another if this one ever wears out. Such a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Assell

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on a recommendation from a friend. He mentioned some colors are cheaper than others so hot pink is what the hubby got for xmas! He was stoked and didn't even care that it was pink..a basket is a basket. Great quality, study and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: KowskiFam

customer_reviews.title: This goal is perfect for some backyard frisbee golf with friends!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these goals in different colors and found that they made for a fun game in our yard with friends. They are easy to assemble. My teenager put them together and they were easy to place in the yard and rather sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lil Practice Basket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale on Black Friday for $87 or something. Works good. There are other identical ones for sale if you look at it closely (foo).
customer_reviews.author: Krimes

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on the day it was supposed to and did not look abused in shipping. Assembled very easily and is solid and stable. The basket catches what it should and has a nice solid sound to it. Well worth the money as this is a quality product at a reasonable price. I am looking forward to practicing every day now since I now have a basket at home. UPDATE, UPDATE, after only a thousand made putts the anodized or powder coated paint is wearing off the pole from the chains.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Practice Basket.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with a practice basket. It’s sturdy but still light enough to move around. The chains are top tier quality. Assembly/disassembly is extremely easy and convenient for transporting the basket. Not to mention, the color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Spend the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Get it, sturdy, catches disc great.. I do keep mine in garage and carry out every day to putt so I can't speak for the weathering. My putting has definitely improved.
customer_reviews.author: William Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basket to enhance your putting skills
customer_reviews.text: Great practice basket, catches good and really quick and easy setup/take down. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dave Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Best regulation size target for the money. Light enough to move around the backyard and catches disks well. I have a couple other baskets from well known brands and this looks just as good. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TractorTeach

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no problems at all
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, has survived several big storms / Nor'easters so far. Regulation size, easy to assemble, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenwoods

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was like an 8 year old at Christmas when we got this for his birthday. Had it put together in less than five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: OBXrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Great basket!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised how solid it is! Really does feel like a real basket, not a cheap alternative. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: serena lewis

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the family to play with on our property. Very easy to assemble. Good quality. Go for the pink!!! It’s cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read that the packaging in the past has been bad but mine was good and showed up in great shape. It was super easy to assemble took about 2 min. I love this thing, It’s just what I need to improve the weakest part of my game, putting.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Stupid simple to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great basket, chains are sturdy basket is just about 1inch short of something you’d play with at a course. Love this thing tho does exactly what it’s supposed to also it’s the best value since all these cheaper baskets are almost identical
customer_reviews.author: Mike stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Not professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Paint missing from spots on the basket and top rim could lead to severe rusting if left outdoors. This could be due to lack of shipping material to protect painted finish and/or abusive package handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disc golf basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is just as good as one on the course of not better. Just wish is came with a carrying case. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Nsmith0104

customer_reviews.title: Great for portable disc golf fun at the park or back yard.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and disassemble. Nice white color I got. Sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Great at home basket. Purchased for my teen sons. They set up a course in the yard. They move the basket a few times during the round. The basket can be moved by one person but is pretty easy to move with 2. Seems to be holding up against the weather. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: awesome game

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket at this price point
customer_reviews.text: A very nice basket for the price. Quite sturdy with a double row of thicker chains that grabs the disc. I have not yet had a disc slip through the chains.
customer_reviews.author: VisualSlap

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Kind of heavy, but that's a good thing. Bought this for my hubby and son. They use it nearly everyday for driving and putting. The basket is a little shallow, but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Portable disc golf basket
customer_reviews.text: Best portable basket out there easy to break down and put in the back of your trunk
customer_reviews.author: B Borgia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for husband on Father’s Day, I easily set it up and he was thrilled to see it in the yard on Father’s Day morning.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband! He loves it! Great quality! Sturdy! Not portable but easy to move!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Rusted chains right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: My the chains on my basket were only partially coated. Resulting in rusted chains right out of the box! I don't know if this is a rare exception or normal. But do they not have quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Haskey

customer_reviews.title: nice but defective
customer_reviews.text: the basket seams like it it should be crafted well. however the post screws are not in straight and it gives the whole thing a lean. you can tell they are bent or warped while screwing them in. I would give it 5 stars other wise
customer_reviews.author: zwief13

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing. Sturdy, catches discs well, looks great (orange). Not bent or cracked at all... Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great practice basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, plays really well. I added some painters tape to the center pole to quiet it down. I didn't want to bother my neighbors
customer_reviews.author: MarkPelly

customer_reviews.title: Love the Addition
customer_reviews.text: Used it alot already and love it. It could be alittle less wobbly on unsturdy ground (mountains) but it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We chose the dark blue net and have loved the at-home practice! The only thing that we do often is place the top black cap back on if disks pop it off! Silly thing to state, but it happens often. Could just be a lost seal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow, great basket
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. Between me and my brother in law, we have just about every major manufacturers basket including recruits, discatchers, a discraft one, and a custom. This one is just as good as any of them. And quite a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the yard. Better quality than I thought it was going to be for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival but still works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Got it set up and found that the basket was bent. Don't know if it was during shipping or manufacturing defect. Still works just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and good quality materials. I just wish it included a travel / storage case
customer_reviews.author: WhiteLight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup,
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Setup takes like 3-5 minutes. It's a great basket for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Was the best surprise for my husband this past Valentine's day
customer_reviews.text: Was the best surprise for my husband this past Valentine's day! He has always voiced how much he loves these baskets and I always acted like I wasn't paying attention for the best surprise 💙
customer_reviews.author: Janet Luna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by the quality and build of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Really good design. Decent enough weight to hold in moderate winds. Does come with ground stakes. Took about a minute to assemble. Very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O.

customer_reviews.title: Basket 5 stars, Packaging 0 stars. Could see a potential problem
customer_reviews.text: Read many helpful reviews before buying this product. A+ quality for home use. Disc throwing in less than 5 min. As everyone said though the packaging is absolutely horrendous. Flimsy and torn apart. Thank goodness no basket problems.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D Urana 3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: breaks down easy, comes together easy. not very heavy, good for at home practice.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Blythe

customer_reviews.title: sub par, not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is too flimsy to protect the basket, it arrived bent. Support posts are-unable to screw into each other due to poor quality control. (Misplaced tack weld or loose hot metal on the threads.) *Manufacturer offered to replace damaged parts.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Basket is well built, easy to assemble, and decently sturdy. I'm definitely glad I went for the slightly heavier model rather than the lite version, though the the lighter one might still be alright. Time to change my putting game during this quarantine!
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Basket came in a little bent due to shipper, there isn't a lot of padding in the packaging. Had to reach out to the company for replacement basket which was sent for free. Basket works great, easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: James Wong

customer_reviews.title: Everything i expected and more
customer_reviews.text: Within a day this basket is already allowing me to get true feedback on my putts. Its too cold to play outside in MI right now so I'm putting inside and feel like I'm already getting improvements on this thing. Outstanding job Axiom.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Now I can miss putts at home.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction. Chains don't feel cheap and catches discs (when I hit them) very nicely. I don't leave it outside though to prevent rust. Not too heavy but does have some weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: William Ford

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We use up on our lot where we camp thinking of getting some of the other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Clinking chains
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you want. Would be perfectly in place on any course. Not the most maneuverability but that’s because it’s all metal and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast, quick set up, now we're playing in our back yard!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic! Works well and super easy to assemble. Weighs too much in my opinion to travel with it. Perfect for the house and my child loves to play with me. Stay classy!
customer_reviews.author: Boldi K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I guess for being portable as it is, it’s a good basket, I’ve just been leaving it up in my yard. Taking a few shots at here and there when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Gary I.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but that's a good thing as far a durability goes
customer_reviews.author: paul simoneau

customer_reviews.title: Portable & Puttable
customer_reviews.text: This basket is perfect for catching discs. If you are looking for the ability to remind yourself every day how terrible you are as a disc golfer ( through no fault of the basket ), this will be perfect for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: quality rivals that of a much, much more expensive basket. Love this! Took all of 2 minutes to assemble. Chains are heavy and count is great. Stable and grabs discs well. no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bragg

customer_reviews.title: works great for practicing at home
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together great for practicing at home or its also nice to make your own little course at your house if you got enough room to do it and have tree or four of them
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and works great. It is very loud with the chains hitting the pole but that was easily solved with a couple rolls of tennis overgrip on the center pole, it is much quieter now.
customer_reviews.author: John Kong

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch, High Quality Disc Basket
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and high quality. It is nicer than some of the permanent baskets at some courses. Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to up their game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legit disc golf basket
customer_reviews.text: It is durable and easy to install. Works perfect for practicing your throws
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: First one was bent. Replacement was fine.
customer_reviews.text: The first one to show up was bent to hell. The replacement was fine. For a practice basket I don’t think you can do much better for the price. Just check for a bent basket.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Haile

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for the cost love it and use it everyday. Easy to move and looks good
customer_reviews.author: mark perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Put this up this winter to practice putting in the warehouse. It's everything it says it is. Holds up well to hard throws and makes the great sound you love to hear after a good shot.
customer_reviews.author: andrew wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great basket. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. Easy assembly. Basket is not quite as deep as a basket on a course but doesn’t affect catching much. Great for the backyard but too heavy to take with you to set up your own holes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Petriekis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing delivers. The hot pink is hilarious and bright. The chains are heavy and no pass throughs yet. The powdercoat is well done. Straight and stable basket. Don't go cheaper. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Baskets!
customer_reviews.text: We love these baskets! Easy to assemble, and the variety of color choices is great. We have several colors and really like the blue and white.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ballantyne

product_meta.title: Axiom Discs Pro 24-Chain Disc Golf Basket
product_meta.description: The Axiom Pro Basket brings inescapable visibility to the design and quality known from the MVP Black Hole Pro! The Axiom Pro Basket comes in six vibrant colors: White, Yellow, Red, Orange, Light Blue, and Lime. The tough powder-coated coloring covers the basket head to toe, everything but the chains. Specs are identical to the MVP Black Hole Pro: two chain tiers comprising 24 strands of heavy course-weighted chain, equidistant strand placement for maximum catching ability, and threaded tension connections for rapid and sturdy assembly. The Axiom Pro is a brightly colored version of disc golf's most popular home basket, the Black Hole Pro, so bring one home today!
feature_bullets: Can only be shipped to continental USA
